spatial_accuracy.notes: Excellent adherence to the floor plan layout. All wall alignments and room adjacencies are preserved. There are minor scale variances in the foyer and secondary bathroom widths, and some door swings are simplified or slightly misplaced relative to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Full compliance. Roof is removed, all interior walls are visible, no rooms are missing, and no text or measurement lines appear. The model correctly floats on a dark neutral background.

furniture_mapping.notes: Clean block-style furniture accurately reflects the floor plan. The kitchen counter configuration and the specific arrangements of regional seating in the living area are highly faithful. Deducted one point for simplified geometry of specific fixtures like the vanity in the master suite.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Adheres perfectly to the low-poly style with flat shading. Lighting is soft and non-dramatic. The isometric orthographic camera angle is correctly applied. Very slight 'glow' on some surfaces prevents a perfect score.

detected_errors.description: Minor door placement/orientation simplification compared to the specific swings indicated in the 2D CAD blueprint.
